original_text: They had with them every wild animal according to its kind, all livestock according to their kinds, every creature that moves along the ground according to its kind and every bird according to its kind, everything with wings.
korean_text: 그들과 모든 들짐승이 그 종류대로, 모든 가축이 그 종류대로, 땅에 기는 모든 것이 그 종류대로, 모든 새가 그 종류대로

sentences.original_text: They had with them every wild animal
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들과 함께 모든 들짐승을 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: all livestock according to their kinds
every creature that moves along the ground
and every bird according to its kind
